characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: A Hellforged Rapier can only fire its ranged weapon if a friendly (Legion) Chaos Space Marine Crewman model from the same unit is within 3". A single Chaos Space Marine Crewman cannot operate multiple Hellforged Rapiers in this way in a single turn. If all of the Chaos Space Marine Crewman from the same unit within 6" of a Hellforged Rapier are slain, it loses the Artillery ability and gains the Daemon Unleashed ability and operates under the rules of that ability instead.
